DESCRIPTION:
arrange: A working application of content-cache charm integrated with config charm.
    act: Makes some requests to the content-cache.
    assert: The cache log contains the metrics.
NAME: test_metric_log

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: A working application of content-cache charm integrated with config charm.
    act:
        1. Integrate with grafana-agent charm.
        2. Remove integration with grafana-agent charm.
    assert:
        1. Charms in active status.
        2. Charms in active status.
NAME: test_integrate_with_cos

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: A working application of content-cache charm with configurations. The backends
        configuration has non-existence server and a fallback server.
    act: Make a request to the content-cache.
    assert: The fallback server respond with the output.
NAME: test_charm_with_failover

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: The applications deployed.
    act: Nothing.
    assert: The applications in blocked status waiting for integration.
NAME: test_charm_start

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: One backend responding 418 on its healthcheck. And valid status to match it or not.
    act: Nothing.
    assert: HTTP request should fail as 200 is not a valid status here.
NAME: test_healthchecks_ssl_verify[no_ssl_verify]

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: One backend responding 418 on its healthcheck. And valid status to match it or not.
    act: Nothing.
    assert: HTTP request should fail as 200 is not a valid status here.
NAME: test_healthchecks_custom_status[healthy]

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: Two backends responding 200 on their healthchecks.
    act: Turn one backend unhealty.
    assert: HTTP request should succeed. One backend is reported UP. One backend is reported DOWN.
NAME: test_healthchecks_one_unhealthy

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: One backend responding 418 on its healthcheck. And valid status to match it or not.
    act: Nothing.
    assert: HTTP request should fail as 200 is not a valid status here.
NAME: test_healthchecks_custom_status[unhealthy]

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: Two backends. One responding 200 on its healthcheck, and the other 500.
    act: Bring back the faulty backend to an healthy state.
    assert: HTTP request should succeed. Two backends are reported up.
NAME: test_healthchecks_one_recovery

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: One backend responding 418 on its healthcheck. And valid status to match it or not.
    act: Nothing.
    assert: HTTP request should fail as 200 is not a valid status here.
NAME: test_healthchecks_ssl_verify[ssl_verify]

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: A working application of content-cache charm, with no integrations.
    act:
        1. Integrate with the configuration charm with configuration set.
        2. Wait for a while, then query again.
        3. Wait until the cache expires, then query again.
        4. Remove the configuration on the configuration charm.
        5. Remove the integration between the charms.
    assert:
        1. The request to the cache should succeed.
        2. The timestamp of the response should be the same as last request.
        3. The timestamp of the response should be refreshed.
        4. The configuration charm should be in blocked state. The content-cache charm will be
            serving according to the old configuration.
        5. The application in blocked status waiting for integration.
NAME: test_charm_integrate_with_data

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: A working charm with integration with two configuration charms.
    act: Make query to content cache for both configurations.
    assert: Both request should succeed.
NAME: test_charm_with_two_config_app

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: Two backends responding 200 on their healthchecks.
    act: Nothing.
    assert: HTTP request should succeed and two backends are reported up in the status page.
NAME: test_healthchecks_healthy

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: A working application of content-cache charm no integration.
    act: Integrate with configuration charm then TLS certificate charm.
    assert: HTTPS request should succeed.
NAME: test_integrate_with_data_then_cert

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: Two healthy backends.
    act: Turn both backends unhealth.
    assert: HTTP request should fail with 502. Both backends are reported DOWN.
NAME: test_healthchecks_all_unhealthy

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: A working application of content-cache charm no integration.
    act: Integrate with TLS certificate charm then configuration charm.
    assert: HTTPS request should succeed.
NAME: test_integrate_with_cert_then_data

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: A working application of content-cache charm, with no integrations, and a test HTTP
        server.
    act:
        1. Integrate with the configuration charm.
        2. Add configuration to the configuration charm.
    assert:
        1. The application in blocked status waiting for integration.
        2. The request to the cache should succeed.
NAME: test_charm_integrate_with_no_data
